nodes.text: Little Vixen was a transport used by Paige and Rose Tico, along with, Reeve Panzoro during the Atterra campaign. The Vixen was too small to carry any kind of freight. It was an outdated model of a ship that had never been popular. It didn't appear to be armed, although it did have a small laser cannon that was pilot operated. It was slower than a landspeeder. It was so shabby and ordinary that it would have been easily overlooked. It was a perfect ship for reconnaissance. It could land just about anywhere. It had been fitted with a Class 1 hyperdrive, allowing it to travel through hyperspace at the same rate as an X-wing starfighter. It carried a tracking device that allowed the Resistance to monitor its movements when it reached an agreed-on destination. It was also programmed to purge its files and self destruct if it were ever to fall into enemy hands, essentially making it a suicide device. Rose had also fitted it with a power baffler that hid its energy trace.
